MixedCollection
  @/@25646
  sname
  allowFunctions
  stype
  boolean
  sinputtype
  truefalse
  sgroup
  MixedCollection
  Sdescription
#$@text#$@
Specify <tt>true</tt> if the <a href="output/Ext.util.MixedCollection.html#Ext.util.MixedCollection-addAll" ext:member="addAll" ext:cls="Ext.util.MixedCollection">addAll</a>
function should add function references to the collection. Defaults to
<tt>false</tt>.
#$@text#$@
  LvalidateOnBlur
  false
  LallowDecimals
  false
  LallowNegative
